mapper.select: select u.user_id userId, u.username userName, u.loginname loginName, r.role_name roleName, u.status, u.create_time createTime, u.update_time updateTime from t_user u, t_user_role ur, t_role r where u.user_id = ur.user_id and ur.role_id = r.role_id order by #{sortField} ${sortOrder}

select m.permission_name from t_permission m ,t_user u ,t_user_role ur, t_role_permission rm where m.permission_id = rm.permission_id and ur.role_id = rm.role_id and ur.user_id = u.user_id and u.loginname = #{loginName}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (user_id, username, loginname, password, status, create_time) values (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{loginName}, #{password}, #{status}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select role_id from t_role where role_name = #{roleName}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user_role (id, user_id, role_id) values (#{id}, #{userId}, #{roleId})
